mapper.select:
SELECT a.*, e.name, l.username FROM cmm_action_log a LEFT OUTER JOIN client_user e ON a.user_id = e.id LEFT OUTER JOIN client_user_login l ON a.user_id = l.user_id
AND a.created_at BETWEEN #{actionLogRequestDto.startedAt} and CONCAT(#{actionLogRequestDto.endedAt},'.999')
AND a.client_id = #{actionLogRequestDto.clientId}
AND a.div_cd = #{actionLogRequestDto.divCd}
AND e.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{actionLogRequestDto.name}),'%')
AND l.username LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{actionLogRequestDto.username}),'%')
AND a.ip LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{actionLogRequestDto.ip}),'%')
